data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 1, M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Hoffenheim.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 4, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matthias Ginter for M´gladbach who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 7, Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach's Matthias Ginter is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Frank Willenborg signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Hoffenheim surge into the attack at Borussia-Park but Florian Grillitsch’s header is off-target.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach's Florian Neuhaus gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Florian Grillitsch of Hoffenheim smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
M´gladbach's Breel Embolo breaks free at Borussia-Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 12, Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Free kick M´gladbach.
M´gladbach's Lars Stindl misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 14, Frank Willenborg awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Free kick in a good position for Hoffenheim!
In the minute 18, Robert Skov of Hoffenheim gets in a strike, but is off target.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
M´gladbach are coming forward and Florian Neuhaus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 21, M´gladbach are pushing forward but Breel Embolo's finish is wide of the goal.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
M´gladbach advance rapidly upfield but Frank Willenborg blows for offside.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 29, M´gladbach drive upfield and Lars Stindl gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hoffenheim defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Breel Embolo for M´gladbach gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Frank Willenborg awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Penalty! Frank Willenborg points to the spot, great chance for M´gladbach...
Goal! M´gladbach take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Lars Stindl spot-kick..
In Monchengladbach, Hoffenheim push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 36, Hoffenheim's Andrej Kramaric fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Hoffenheim's Florian Grillitsch misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
In the minute 37, Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Hoffenheim.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 38, Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 41, Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Stefan Posch (Hoffenheim) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
In the minute 41, Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hoffenheim needs to be cautious. M´gladbach have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 44, M´gladbach are coming forward and Lars Stindl gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Frank Willenborg awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach attack but Marcus Thuram's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Borussia-Park.
The second-half has started.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 46, Sebastian Hoeness is making the team's first substitution at Borussia-Park with Sebastian Rudy replacing Dennis Geiger.
The match at Borussia-Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Florian Grillitsch, who is down injured.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim's Florian Grillitsch looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 55, Hoffenheim drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 59, M´gladbach's Lars Stindl is on target but unsuccessful.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Hoffenheim pushes forward through Christoph Baumgartner, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 61, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In the minute 62, M´gladbach are pushing forward but Valentino Lazaro's finish is wide of the goal.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 65, M´gladbach drives forward and Breel Embolo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hoffenheim's Florian Grillitsch gets in a shot on goal at Borussia-Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Frank Willenborg signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
In the minute 67, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Hoffenheim.
Ihlas Bebou is on a sub for Ishak Belfodil for Hoffenheim.
Sebastian Hoeness (Hoffenheim) is making a third substitution, with Munas Dabbur replacing Robert Skov.
In the minute 72, Free kick M´gladbach.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 74, Hannes Wolf is replacing Patrick Herrmann for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Andrej Kramaric gets an equalizer for Hoffenheim. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 75, Great play from Ihlas Bebou to set up the goal.
M´gladbach pushes forward through Marcus Thuram, whose finish on goal is saved.
He's off! Marcus Thuram is shown a red card.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 79, Hoffenheim's Stefan Posch has been booked in Monchengladbach.
The away team have replaced Stefan Posch with Kevin Akpoguma. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
In the minute 80, M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Frank Willenborg awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Marco Rose is making the team's second substitution at Borussia-Park with Denis Zakaria replacing Florian Neuhaus.
In the minute 85, Sebastian Rudy of Hoffenheim gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Sargis Adamyan is replacing Florian Grillitsch for Hoffenheim at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 86, Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Ryan Sessegnon.
Kevin Akpoguma instrumental with a fine assist.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 87, Sebastian Rudy for Hoffenheim has been booked by Frank Willenborg and receives a first yellow card.
M´gladbach push upfield and Breel Embolo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Hoffenheim defence.
The home team have replaced Lars Stindl with Ibrahima Traore. This is the third substitution made today by Marco Rose.
In the minute 89, Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Hoffenheim's Sargis Adamyan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Matthias Ginter (M´gladbach) has received a yellow card from Frank Willenborg.
